name: Dreamland (itch)
description:
DREAMLAND

Dreamland is a fun simple platformer based on the dreams of a young girl in a coma. This is the first game ever released by Highrise studios. 

Here's a small tips when opening the game the best graphic setting for optimal performance and look is setting graphic to 'good'. Remember if you would like to support Highrise you could donate with the 'name your price' system if not thats okay simply click on 'no thanks, just take me to the download'.

you may also download the game at http://gamejolt.com/games/Dreamland/275303

Furthermore there is more info at highrisestudios.weebly.com  

Questions or enquiry: high_rise_help@outlook.com

- Highrise
